CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Saverone 2014 Ltd provides driver protection solutions. The company is engaged in developing and deploying transportation safety and advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS) technologies and solutions. The company's product restricts the driver from surfing, communicating and receiving alerts while driving. The Company has developed a system which provides a solution to the problem of distracted driving caused by cell phone use, which endangers the driver, passengers, other drivers on the road and pedestrians.
